channel.title: Heaven-pkz REALEASED!
channel.description:
[SIZE=5][B][U]Features[/U][/B][/SIZE] [b] DOWNLOAD LINK: http://www.multiupload.com/00WXWR3GRE CLIENT: http://www.multiupload.com/DC82PQRFX4[/b] SERVER SIDED FIXED: Client.java Changed:
(inStream.readUnsignedWord() == 317))
To
(inStream.readUnsignedWord() == 0))
[B][SIZE=3][U][IMG]http://i124.photobucket.com/albums/p5/shogunreaper/client.gif[/img]Godswords - made 474 style[IMG]http://i124.photobucket.com/albums/p5/shogunreaper/client.gif[/img][/U][/SIZE][/B] [COLOR=RoyalBlue]- Updated walking/running/stand/block/attack animations. - GFXs matching emotes 100%, perfect delays hits and all effects of current runescape. - Bandos godsword GFX changed to current runescape (purple border). - Working barrage with the zamorak godsword on npcs as well as other players (entanglement).[/COLOR] [B][SIZE=3][U][IMG]http://i124.photobucket.com/albums/p5/shogunreaper/client.gif[/img]NPCs[IMG]http://i124.photobucket.com/albums/p5/shogunreaper/client.gif[/img][/U][/SIZE][/B] [COLOR=Orange]Godwar NPCs added: - Kree arra - Armadyl Boss Sub Bosses - Flight Kilisa, Flockleader Geerin, Wingman Skree - Commander Zilyana - Saradomin Boss Sub Bosses - Growler, Starlight, Bree - General Graardor - Bandos Boss Sub Bosses - Sergeant Grimspike, Sergeant Steelwill, Sergeant Strongstack - K ril Tsutsaroth - Zamorak Boss Sub Bosses - Zakln Gritch, Balfrug Kreeyath, Tstanon Karlak - All have correct animations and drops [/COLOR] [B][SIZE=3][U][IMG]http://i124.photobucket.com/albums/p5/shogunreaper/client.gif[/img]Magic & Range[IMG]http://i124.photobucket.com/albums/p5/shogunreaper/client.gif[/img][/U][/SIZE][/B] [COLOR=Green]Updated magic & range system similar to rs - Range and magic following - Working on perfecting barrage (instant) - Correct range gfxs (projectiles) for almost all bows - All lunar functions - vengeance, vengeance other, etc. - All ancients functions - Multi Barrage[/COLOR] [B][SIZE=3][U][IMG]http://i124.photobucket.com/albums/p5/shogunreaper/client.gif[/img]Minigames[IMG]http://i124.photobucket.com/albums/p5/shogunreaper/client.gif[/img][/U][/SIZE][/B] [COLOR=Red]Their are many minigames to play on Heaven-Pkz some are - Pest Control - very easy minigame with a nice rewards shop which includes void armour and experience. - Fight Pits - play a game of "fun pking" with friends - winner gains gold. - Fight Caves - play a one wave (hard) minigame and see if you can claim a fire cape. - God Wars - a unique godwars with all bosses and minions. Drops include hilts and shards. - Barrows very easy, nice rewards. - Funpk area - just pk for fun in an area where you don’t lose items.[/COLOR] [B][SIZE=3][U][IMG]http://i124.photobucket.com/albums/p5/shogunreaper/client.gif[/img]Client Updates[IMG]http://i124.photobucket.com/albums/p5/shogunreaper/client.gif[/img][/U][/SIZE][/B] [COLOR=Sienna]- Updated prayer interfaces (474-style) with all effects working. - New 474 weapon interfaces - Custom assault reward interfaces - Pest control interfaces very similar to that of runescape. - New emotes system - New GFX system - Updated models - matches 474 & 508[/COLOR] [SIZE=3][B][U]Miscellaneous[/U][/B][/SIZE] - Emotes - Many new emotes (emote system entirely rebuilt) including new whip attack styles, godswords, defenders, bows, etc. - Uptime is 24/7 (100.8% according to runelocu$) - 5GB Dedicated VPS bought - Reset the server a while ago - no dupes - ALL METHODS OF DUPING FIXED! - We have an economy - PvP Points system with a reward shop [B][U]GIFs[/U][/B] [SIZE=4]Armadyl godsword animations[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i639.photobucket.com/albums/uu115/paul0wn/Ags-1.gif[/img] [SIZE=4]Saradomin godsword animations[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i639.photobucket.com/albums/uu115/paul0wn/Sgs-1.gif[/img] [SIZE=4]Bandos godsword animations[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i639.photobucket.com/albums/uu115/paul0wn/Bgs-3.gif[/img] [SIZE=4]Zamorak godsword animations [/SIZE] [IMG]http://i639.photobucket.com/albums/uu115/paul0wn/Zgs-1.gif[/img] ------ [SIZE=4] Vengeance (new):[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i639.photobucket.com/albums/uu115/paul0wn/veng-1.gif[/img] [SIZE=4]Veng Other (new):[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i639.photobucket.com/albums/uu115/paul0wn/VengOther.gif[/img] [SIZE=4][U][B]Godwar NPCs (Bosses and sub-bosses)[/B][/U][/SIZE] [SIZE=4]Kree arra:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i639.photobucket.com/albums/uu115/paul0wn/GWD-1.jpg[/img] [SIZE=4]Pest Control Rewards Shop[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i639.photobucket.com/albums/uu115/paul0wn/VoidShop.jpg[/img] [SIZE=4]Pest item.title: Heaven-pkz REALEASED!
item.dc:creator: @y0u_kn0w_m3 y0u kn0w m3
item.description:
@y0u_kn0w_m3 wrote:

[quote=“scimmik0, post:1, topic:324070”][SIZE=5]Features[/SIZE]

DOWNLOAD LINK: http://www.multiupload.com/00WXWR3GRE
CLIENT: http://www.multiupload.com/DC82PQRFX4

SERVER SIDED FIXED:
Client.java
Changed:

(inStream.readUnsignedWord() == 317))[/quote] To [quote](inStream.readUnsignedWord() == 0))

[SIZE=3]Godswords - made 474 style[/SIZE]
[COLOR=RoyalBlue]- Updated walking/running/stand/block/attack animations.

  • GFXs matching emotes 100%, perfect delays hits and all effects of current runescape.
  • Bandos godsword GFX changed to current runescape (purple border).
  • Working barrage with the zamorak godsword on npcs as well as other players (entanglement).[/COLOR]

[SIZE=3]NPCs[/SIZE]
[COLOR=Orange]Godwar NPCs added:

  • Kree arra - Armadyl Boss
    Sub Bosses - Flight Kilisa, Flockleader Geerin, Wingman Skree
  • Commander Zilyana - Saradomin Boss
    Sub Bosses - Growler, Starlight, Bree
  • General Graardor - Bandos Boss
    Sub Bosses - Sergeant Grimspike, Sergeant Steelwill, Sergeant Strongstack
  • K ril Tsutsaroth - Zamorak Boss
    Sub Bosses - Zakln Gritch, Balfrug Kreeyath, Tstanon Karlak
  • All have correct animations and drops
    [/COLOR]

[SIZE=3]Magic & Range[/SIZE]
[COLOR=Green]Updated magic & range system similar to rs

  • Range and magic following
  • Working on perfecting barrage (instant)
  • Correct range gfxs (projectiles) for almost all bows
  • All lunar functions - vengeance, vengeance other, etc.
  • All ancients functions
  • Multi Barrage[/COLOR]

[SIZE=3]Minigames[/SIZE]
[COLOR=Red]Their are many minigames to play on Heaven-Pkz some are

  • Pest Control - very easy minigame with a nice rewards shop which includes void armour and experience.
  • Fight Pits - play a game of “fun pking” with friends - winner gains gold.
  • Fight Caves - play a one wave (hard) minigame and see if you can claim a fire cape.
  • God Wars - a unique godwars with all bosses and minions. Drops include hilts and shards.
  • Barrows very easy, nice rewards.
  • Funpk area - just pk for fun in an area where you don’t lose items.[/COLOR]

[SIZE=3]Client Updates[/SIZE]
[COLOR=Sienna]- Updated prayer interfaces (474-style) with all effects working.

  • New 474 weapon interfaces
  • Custom assault reward interfaces
  • Pest control interfaces very similar to that of runescape.
  • New emotes system
  • New GFX system
  • Updated models - matches 474 & 508[/COLOR]

[SIZE=3]Miscellaneous[/SIZE]

  • Emotes - Many new emotes (emote system entirely rebuilt) including new whip attack styles, godswords, defenders, bows, etc.
  • Uptime is 24/7 (100.8% according to runelocu$)
  • 5GB Dedicated VPS bought
  • Reset the server a while ago - no dupes - ALL METHODS OF DUPING FIXED!
  • We have an economy
  • PvP Points system with a reward shop

GIFs

[SIZE=4]Armadyl godsword animations[/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]Saradomin godsword animations[/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]Bandos godsword animations[/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]Zamorak godsword animations [/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]
Vengeance (new):[/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]Veng Other (new):[/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]Godwar NPCs (Bosses and sub-bosses)[/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]Kree arra:[/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]K ril Tsutsaroth[/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]General Graardor:[/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]Commander Zilyana:[/SIZE]

Pictures

[SIZE=4]Godwars[/SIZE]

GWD3.jpg763×503

GWD2.jpg763×505

GWD-1.jpg762×499

[SIZE=4]Pest Control Rewards Shop[/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]Pest Control Minigame
[/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]474 updated weapon interfaces[/SIZE]

Weapons2.jpg957×678
[SIZE=4]

EquipmentStats.jpg763×502
[/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]Skilling at Catherby[/SIZE]


[SIZE=4]
Slaying abyssals at the slayer tower[/SIZE]

[/quote]
